sentences.en: A city of northwest Afghanistan on the Hari Rud east of Kabul.
sentences.cn: 赫拉特阿富汗西北部的一城市,位于喀布尔以东,在哈里河上.

sentences.en: Geylang Serai is where the crowd goes for Hari Raya Puasa.
sentences.cn: 在开斋节,人们都涌到芽龙士乃.

sentences.en: Hari was profoundly moved and shed tears.
sentences.cn: 哈里被深深地感动了,流下了眼泪.

sentences.en: Johann Hari is a writer for the Independent newspaper.
sentences.cn: 约翰 • 哈里是《独立报》作家。

sentences.en: The brothers who , in return for blows, offer to sinners Hari's love.
sentences.cn: 作为对突然打击的回应, 两兄弟把哈瑞的爱献祭给罪人.

sentences.en: Who are none other than Hari Himself and chant His hallowed name!
sentences.cn: 这不是别的,正是哈瑞自己,唱颂他的圣名吧!
